text: Structural tennis lesson and debrief by coach Anthony helps beginner to understand the fundamental and enable leisure players to improve their technics. Group/private class available,totally recommend for anyone who want to expose to tennis!

⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

Coach Anthony is a fantastic tennis coach! He is patient, encouraging, and always makes the lessons fun and engaging. We’ve learned so much from him, and his teaching style keeps us motivated while improving our skills. Every class is enjoyable, and we always look forward to the next one. Highly recommend him to anyone looking to learn or improve their tennis!

I’ve been learning tennis with Meta Tennis since 2023 as a total beginner and it’s been such a positive experience! Coach Anthony is super patient and encouraging - he breaks down the basics in a way that’s easy to understand, which really helped me build a good foundation.

Over time, I’ve improved my basic tennis skills like my swing, footwork and overall coordination. The sessions are well-paced and I always leave feeling like I’ve learned something new.

Booking is also super convenient and fuss-free, which makes it easy to stay consistent. Highly recommend Meta Tennis to anyone looking to pick up tennis in a fun and supportive environment!

Attended group lessons with Coach Anthony as a complete beginner, and now I am confident with my tennis basics.

Lessons are well structured, progression is just right and Coach always gives good advice about various things - individual mistakes, game tactics, what to look out for as beginners , equipment recommendations. Would recommend Meta Tennis and Coach Anthony if anyone wants to learn or improve their tennis skills.
Coach Anthony is very professional, friendly and encouraging. He always pushes me to do my best  patiently while keeping lessons enjoyable. Highly recommend !
